actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to permit the temporary operation of certain aircraft without emergency locator transmitters.

summary.text: Exempts, under the Federal Aviation Act, aircraft from the requirements that such aircraft be equipped with an emergency locator transmitter, when such transmitter has been temporarily removed for repair, modification, or replacement.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to permit the temporary operation of certain aircraft without emergency locator transmitters.
